task.title: Purchasing Subscriptions in the Community Portal
task.abstract: Authenticated and unauthenticated users can purchase subscriptions in the Community Portal via the Store. Authenticated users can additionally manage their subscription using the side navbar on their Profile page.

ul.li: Authenticated users should log in to their Community Portal

step.cmd: Click on Store in the top navbar to browse items available for purchase.

substep.cmd: Click on the desired subscription to continue to the Subscription Detail page.

step.cmd: Click the Add to Cart button.
step.stepresult: The Subscription modal is returned for subscribers to select an available subscription plan, create assignments, and

step.cmd: If more than one plan is linked to a subscription item, click the Select button on the desired plan and click Next.

substep.cmd: If the selected Subscription Plan is enabled for Auto Renewal, select the Payment Method from the picklist or create a new payment method.

step.cmd: If the subscription item has a form attachment, both authenticated and unauthenticated users must complete the form. Click Next.

Authenticated users can select their Role using the picklist and click the + Add New Contact button to add additional beneficiaries of the subscription being purchased. If the additional people are already listed on the Account, then their contact details will display on the Assign tab in the modal. The portal user must click the checkbox in the Assign column to grant each contact the benefits of the subscription. If the desired contacts are not listed on the Account, then click the + Add New Contact button; this will create a Contact record for each entry. Next, click the checkbox in the Assign column to grant the new contacts the benefits of the subscription. Click the Next button to add any additional items or View Shopping Cart to proceed to checkout.
step.info: The Assign tab is not displayed to unauthenticated users.

step.cmd: Review items in the cart. Click Checkout and complete payment information.
Click the Pay button to complete purchase.

taskbody.result: Once the subscription is purchased, then the user can view their subscription in the My Subscriptions tab on their Profile page in the portal.
